attributes.action: Listen to the Clinically Extremely Vulnerable.
attributes.additional_details: As seen over the last month or so the new cases are rising and local lockdown areas have all of these restrictions implemented but there is never nothing said about the Clinically Extremely Vulnerable. With local lockdown the shielding should be restarted to help protect the people  within these areas.
attributes.background: Restart Shielding to the Clinically Extremely Vulnerable due to rising Coronavirus numbers. I myself am classed within this category due to transplantation and due to rising numbers we as a community feel we are not being listened to.
